name: Retime The Wind
description:
Plot

In retime the wind you are a crocodile that is able to go back in time with the use of a cassette tape, and your mission is to eat all the giant balls of chewing gum, so that people do not start to float, and to satisfy your appetite.

GAME MADE FOR THE BRACKEYS GAME JAM 2020.2 WITH THE THEME "REWIND"

AND PLEASE, IF LIKED, RATE THE GAME WHEN THE BRACKEYS GAME JAM STARTS
